name: Excadrill
description: The Subterrene Pokémon. More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage, and its speed is doubled in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)
